description:
Before joining the crew of Queen Cosmos, Don Haka had the role of protector of his planet and people. He is a cheerful, constantly hungry cyborg with a big heart.
He flies the vessel Starbood (equipped with a powerful drill to be able to travel underground as well as in space) and fights with a mace, that turns into a flail when swung.
His character is based on the pig-demon, Zhu Bajie.
name: Don Hakka
